Compensation.Explanation: Employee was hired in mid July; benefits have a waiting period before they become effective.

ReasonableCauseExplanation.Explanation: Resignation of key accounting personnel caused a significant delay in completion of the audit which in turn delayed the completion of this filing. Both the Director of Accounting and the VP-Accounting left within a short time span.
